testcase.name: All users can see the delete button by hovering over the three dots at the end of each row
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on the login page.........................................passed When The user enters with valid "user1" and password and clicks login button.passed And The user navigates to Fleet-Vehicles page-for all users.................passed Then The user hover over the three dots and able to see delete button.......passed

testcase.name: If the driver clicks on the "Yes, Delete" button, "You do not have permission to perform this action." message should be displayed
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on the login page.........................................passed When The user enters with valid "user1" and password and clicks login button.passed And The user navigates to Fleet-Vehicles page-for all users.................passed And The user clicks the delete button.......................................passed And The user clicks the Yes, Delete button..................................passed Then The user should see "You do not have permission to perform this action." message.passed

testcase.name: When 'Sales Manager' and 'Store Manager' delete a car, the corresponding car should also be removed from the Fleet-Vehicle page.
